refsect1.title: Controller Bus Addresses
refsect1.para: Controller bus addresses are specified as an URI, where the URI scheme defines the type of the bus. Currently, only the PCI bus is supported. The address syntax for PCI devices is: pci:DDDD:BB:SS.F, where DDDD is the PCI domain, BB is the PCI bus number inside the domain, SS is the slot in the domain, and F is the function.
